item.title: Implement scripts running in Alfred Workflows with deanishe/awgo
item.description: deanishe/awgo is a library to implement scripts running in Alfred Workflows. It enables to pass values to the next object with NewItem(), access keychain, and check logs with MagicAction by passing workflow:log as arguments. package main import ( "fmt" aw "github.com/deanishe/awgo" "github.com/deanishe/awgo/keychain" "log" "strings" ) var wf *aw.Workflow func init() { wf = aw.New() } func run() { kc := keychain.New("test-alfred-workflow") kc.Set("test", strings.Join(wf.Args(), ", ")) password, err := kc.Get("test") if
